title: Trump Sued By New York Attorney General
itunes:title: Trump Sued By New York Attorney General
description: Letitia James, New York's Attorney General, just announced a $250 million civil lawsuit against President Trump, the Trump Organization, as well as Donald Trump Jr., Eric Trump, and Ivanka Trump. Jay, Logan, and the Sekulow team break down the allegations, motives involved, and what to expect next. This and more today on Sekulow.
